channel.title: Donator Items Help

item.title: Donator Items Help
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:2, topic:391366”]Doesnt look like delta…

But if it is anything close to delta, look for your wear(

	public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

add something like this

if(wearID == 13636 && donator == 0){ // donater item sM("You must be a Donator to be able to wear this item"); sM("Life time membership is less than 1 X $5 payment, Donate at "); return false; } if(wearID == 16002 && donator == 0){ // donater item sM("You must be a Donator to be able to wear this item"); sM("Life time membership is less than 1 X $5 payment, Donate at "); return false; } [/quote]
Sorry i should have put which base im using, im using PI and it didnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Items Help
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Doesnt look like delta…

But if it is anything close to delta, look for your wear(

	public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

add something like this

if(wearID == 13636 && donator == 0){ // donater item
sM("You must be a Donator to be able to wear this item");
sM("Life time membership is less than 1 X $5 payment, Donate at ");
return false;
}
if(wearID == 16002 && donator == 0){ // donater item
sM("You must be a Donator to be able to wear this item");
sM("Life time membership is less than 1 X $5 payment, Donate at ");
return false;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Items Help
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

Hi im having trouble with my donator items. when you arent donator the item says that you must be donator to use it and it doesnt let them use it and when you are donator it still wont let you use/wear the item can anyone help? heres the code is there something i did wrong?

if(Config.itemRequirements) {
if(c.Donatorreq > 0){ {
c.sendMessage(“You Must Be Donator To Use/Wear This Item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

Read full topic
